p: Various cell cycle checkpoints act as potential targets for cancer treatment [ 10]. Several nutraceuticals prevent cancer cells from transitioning from the G1 to S phase. EOs and their constituents serve as effective anticancer substances by targeting cell cycle progression in cancer cells [ 10]. In colorectal cancer cells, the maximal alteration in cancer cell cycle progression in the G2/M phase promoted by TA-1 was observed at 24 h. Volatile oils and their constituents serve as effective anticancer substances by targeting cell cycle progression in cancer cells [ 10]. Thymol, a phenolic compound of Teucrium essential oil, induced cell cycle arrest at the G0/G1 phase [ 39]. Gene products involved in cell proliferation were found here to be overexpressed in HCT116 cells. Hydrophobic and hydrophylic fractions decreased cell proliferation in human colon cancer cells through a decrease of Cyclin D1 and p21.
